alert.note: Alert for Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 10:55PM CDT until June 23 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Morrill County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 1045 PM MDT. * At 955 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles northeast of The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92, or 21 miles south of Alliance, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Morrill County. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.
